column1: I got this because I needed a good moisturizer. I normally don't prefer the feel of creams but I really needed one. This one is light and comfortable. Smells good too!

Now, I know I should have been using moisturizer all along. I picked up Age Perfect Cell Renewal Night Cream and Age Perfect Cell Renewal Day Cream at CVS the other day. After one use, my skin was soothed, soft and the roughness is smoother. I can't believe how healthy my skin looks after just a few days.
My first use of this product and it does a wonderful job. Also the eye cream is so easy to use and it got rid of all the dryness around my eyes.
